title: Bestlite Style Wall Lamp - BL5
body: Highly influenced by the school of Bauhaus simplicity and clean shapes, the British designer Robert Dudley Best designed the Bestlite Style BL5 Wall Lamp in 1930. With its adjustable arm, both horizontal and vertical, and movable shade, the Bestlite Style BL5 Wall Lamp suits well by the desk, as a bedside lamp or in the kitchen where the light needs to be directed. Bestlite is held in permanent collections at both the Victoria & Albert Museum and the Design Museum in London.
